system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

As a Paramedics with Master's Degree, your work involves administer basic or advanced emergency medical care and assess injuries and illnesses. may administer medication intravenously, use equipment such as ekgs, or administer advanced life support to sick or injured individuals.
